overview: Henryk Roszponka, a thirty-year-old bricklayer, and his young helper, Toddler, wake up with a heavy hangover. They fail to make it to Grandma Stangreciak's funeral. When they reach the cemetery, the ceremony is over. By chance, Rapunzel discovers the abandoned grave of his friend and mentor, Staszek Swan, nearby. Feeling his debtor, he decides to take care of the grave. However, it is not easy when you don't have a penny ...
title: Kalipso
